title: Windows 7 Black 34.01 x64
description:
*******************************************************************************
                           Windows 7 Black 34.01 x64
*******************************************************************************

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Application
Platform.............: Windows




-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                               Post Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Posted by............: Kirk
Posted on............: 7/26/2015
Repost Policy........: 1 day after original post

No Setting were harmed, nothing removed or tweaked, the following registry entries were added only:

Context menu; Copy to, move to, take ownership

Explorer: Show hidden files, show all file extensions

Custom Rainmeter sidebar built by myself, fast stable nice to use. Lots of extra gadgets via rainmeter menus
